questions.q: Would you consider yourself a people person?
How do you earn a potential client's trust?
Do you have any experience dealing with clients?
What do you do in your free time?

answers.correct: Everyone who meets me loves me
I quickly establish a rapport with my clients.
I deal with them in a calming manner and work to resolve their issues.
I like to rest and relax so I'm ready for work the next day.

positive_responses: Your colleagues will be pleased to hear this
Of course, we like to slip a basic question in to test candidates
negative_responses: Is this some kind of joke?
Perhaps this isn't the right role for you
